text: If anyone deserves to live on his birthday, then it has to be Jennifer Lopez. And that's what she did Tuesday night, when she celebrated 49 years with family and friends in the Bahamas. In new photos on Instagram, the World of Dance judge and Shades of Blue Star shared several photos of her memorable birthday. ` ` So believe it or not I just wake up from my birthday party last night, it was a little gathering with the kids and a family and some close friends â€¦ the day and night were full of laughter, tears and of course dancing.. ` `, she shared with her 77 million followers. ` ` I wanted to write you all, I was so delighted and overwhelmed by the stream of love and the birthday wishes you sent me yesterday!
